favorites.title: Gleason under consideration for medal
favorites.desc: Federal lawmakers have submitted legislation to award former Saints player Steve Gleason with the Congressional Gold Medal.

favorites.title: BengalsBurfictofficiallysuspended4games
favorites.desc: The NFL on Thursday officially banned Bengals linebacker Vontaze Burfict four games for violating the league's policy on performance-enhancing substances.

favorites.title: Source:Kapworkoutpostponedoverstance
favorites.desc: Seattle still is considering bringing in Colin Kaepernick for a tryout and no decisions are final, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

favorites.title: BoltsStamkosOKafter3-gameinjurylayoff
favorites.desc: Tampa Bay's Steven Stamkos, who missed the last three games of the regular season with a lower-body injury, will play in Game 1 vs. the Devils.

favorites.title: TexansreleaseOTNewton;failedphysical
favorites.desc: Right tackle Derek Newton has been released by the Texans. Newton reportedly plans to file a grievance over a $500,000 bonus the team says it will not pay.
